body:
Dear all,

I have tried to use the GenCumulativeSky.exe programme made available?through
Diva for Rhino v1.1f.?


When I ran the programme on a DOS command line, it said:

**
Error opening: SGP_Singapore.486980_IWEC.epw
GenCumulativeSky: Error reading climate file SGP_Singapore.486980_IWEC.epw
**

I tried it with the San Francisco .epw file as well but it also didn't work.

Could anyone advise how it can be solved?

Also, may?I know what it means by "hourshift" in the -h entry??

Thanks a lot!

Cheers,
Kam
